title: sdformat8 include directories not exported in pkg-config or cmake config files

content.raw:
# Prerequisites

* [X] Put an X between the brackets on this line if you have done all of the following:
    * Checked the Q&A board for common solutions: http://answers.gazebosim.org
    * Checked that your issue isn't already filed.
    * Checked that there is not already an Ignition package that provides the described functionality: https://ignitionrobotics.org/libs

# Description 

While attempting to build a bottle for ignition-sensors0 in [osrf/simulation pull 497](https://github.com/osrf/homebrew-simulation/pull/497), I noticed that the homebrew formula's test that tries to use the ign-sensors pkg-config file to build an example program was failing to locate the sdformat header file location:

* https://build.osrfoundation.org/job/generic-release-homebrew_bottle_builder/label=osx_mojave/31/console

~~~
ignition/sensors/CameraConfig.hh:25:10: fatal error: 'sdf/sdf.hh' file not found
#include <sdf/sdf.hh>
         ^~~~~~~~~~~~
1 error generated.
Error: osrf/simulation/ignition-sensors0: failed
~~~

I've confirmed that the issue also occurs with the cmake config file.

# Steps to Reproduce

1. Build and install ign-sensors
2. Try to build the [save_image example](#!/ignitionrobotics/ign-sensors/src/d65e56660cd602760c2074c73674562855da0166/examples/save_image/?at=default)
3. It will fail to find the sdf headers.

**Expected behavior:**  

SDF include dirs should be exported with the ign-sensors cmake target and in the pkg-config file, and the example should compile.

**Actual behavior:**

They aren't exported, so the example doesn't compile.

**Reproduces how often:** 

100%

# Versions

0.1.0~pre1, macOS mojave and Ubuntu bionic

# Additional Information
